strategy: The Legiones Skitarii have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: Collegia Titanica formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have a Initiative Rating of 2+. In addition, the Questoris Banner formation is subject to the 'Bravery' special rule.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Skitarii of the Adeptus Mechancius

formations.name: Vanguard Maniple
extraUnits: Replace four Skitarii Vanguards with four Rapiers: Free
Add up to two Onager Dunecrawlers: 50 points each
Add up to two Skorpius Disintegrators: 50 points each

sections.name: Legiones Mars Line Formations
sections.description: Up to three Mars Line Formations for each Core Formation.

formations.name: Sicarian Killclade
formations.units: Four Sicarian Ruststalkers, two Sicarian Infiltrators

formations.name: Ranger Cohort
extraUnits: Add two Scorpius Duneriders, or three Rapiers: 50 points

formations.name: Kastelan Maniple
extraUnits: Add up to two Kastelan Robots for 25 points each

formations.name: Kataphron Maniple
formations.units: One Tech-Priest, five Kataphron Breacher Battle Servitors or five Kataphron Destroyer Battle Servitors

formations.name: Onager Maniple
formations.units: One Onager Dunecrawlers with Icarus Array, three Onager Dunecrawlers with another single configuration

sections.name: Forge World Navy, Collegia Titanica and Questoris Mechanicus Support
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Questoris Banner
formations.units: Two Questoris Knights (may not mix configurations)

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans, both of either Standard or Support Configuration

upgrades.title: Legiones Mars Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace the Magos with a Magos Dominus
Add one Gorgon, five Skorpius Duneriders, or five Termites (must enter the battlefield by tunneling)
Upgrade one Minoris to carry a Support Weapon
Replace the Ordinatus Armageddon with an Ordinatus Mars (Sonic Disruptor)
Replace the Ordinatus Armageddon with an Ordinatus Golgotha (Hellfire Missiles)
Upgrade both Warhounds to Tank Hunter Configuration
